text:
@realDonaldTrump The Dow Jones Industrial Average fell 6.9%, nearly 1,900 points, in its worst single-day drop since the coronavirus sell-off in March. The S&P 500, which fell 5.9%, also had its worst day since March.

Stocks plunged on rising concerns about a second wave of coronavirus infection
